name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Target in Sight
name_original: Mobile Suit Gundam: Target in Sight
description:
Mobile Suit Gundam: Target in Sight is an action-simulation game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It came out on 11-11-2006. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.
Mobile Suit Gundam: Target in Sight is available on PlayStation 3.
It was scored by Takanori Arima.
